name: Air Fighter Gunner
description:
You are never a true soldier if you haven’t been to a war. This time round the war is coming towards our fighter F16 battle hero and he is angry war pilot. Angry pilot clash with the enemy while going behind the enemy lines and show them what you are made up of and seek and destroy every enemy from the air-gunner with extreme prejudice.

Features
- Realistic environments
- Smooth and responsive flight controls
- Modernized weapon choices to equip
- Experience the best fighter jet plane game jerboa war
- WW2 aircraft battle 3d environment
